data.text: @hridayeshjoshi @dineshcsharma @Banjotkaur Emergency use is for Bengal election!

@hridayeshjoshi @dineshcsharma It IS different. In normal course, one would wait for final results of 3rd phase of trial that recruits tens of thousands. (3rd phase is followed by phase 1 n 2 which are small) in emergency, even if interim results of 3rd phase there  (and necessarily full), they are considered.
@dineshcsharma What is emergency use of vaccine? Is it different from the normal vaccination? Can anyone explain? @Banjotkaur
@dineshcsharma Is Vaccine curative or preventive? If it is preventive then what is this talk about emergency use?
@dineshcsharma What that self assumed monk baba Ramdev will do now ?😀
